channel.title: Deployments on ownCloud
channel.description: Recent content in Deployments on ownCloud

item.title: Deploy as an app in ownCloud 10
item.description: Prerequisites Deploying ownCloud Web Configure oauth2 Configure ownCloud 10 Set ownCloud Web address Configure link routing Make ownCloud Web the default web interface Configure ownCloud Web Accessing ownCloud Web The ownCloud Web is being deployed as an app to ownCloud marketplace to enable easy early integration into existing ownCloud 10 instances. After completing this setup, ownCloud Web will be available on https://<your-owncloud-server>/index.
